But they never really got permission from the original artist and just went and did their own thing cause they liked the story. But again the original artist never wanted that kind of ending. This artists on the other hand asked and did a follow up where the kid, form my understanding finally got a hand on that porno and found out they were all raped but intead of being disgusted he manned up and said he was sorry for not being there for them and that he would not protect them.

Not sure why ppl are calling the mom and sisters sluts and knocked up. Original story has all three fall in love with kid, they go on a trip are drugged and raped over and over. All of the get pregnant and goes to have an abort after this and are deeply hurt over it all, the kid thinks he's done something to them and distances himself from them. At the same time the mom wanting to get back at the rapists after one of them contacts her goes out with him until she has gathered enough evidence to get him and all the rapists convicted. Then the story ends with rapists all being arrested but at the same time the kid missunderstands his mom dating someone else and moving on so he distance himself even more. Then it ends with him maybe buying the porno of his sister and moms being raped, but this is also after he was told that all the porn made by that group were done by them raping the ppl in the videos.

I'm not ignoring the story and context. I'm just healthy enough to not self insert myself into a hentai mc and personally feel attacked whenever there's an ntr development. Taking a black and white approach on media is not ideal either, as you can appreciate aspects of a work without fully immersing yourself enough to passionately hate it if your, in your own words "power fantasy" doesn't come into play. That's what power fantasy means, btw. Cuckholding/Ntr is not a power fantasy, like the word "power fantasy" literally implies. 

Tldr; I'm not telling YOU to ignore the story, just be healthy enough to realize that going meta and shaming people just cause you have insecurities tells a lot about yourself.

Ps. It's more sus to feel that much passionate anger over ntr. People who do come off as "coping." 
remember, these characters are not your property and you're not a hentai mc. :)

If you dont get invested in the characters then youre missing a large chunk of the fetishes as many are presented through the dialogue and story. Its on you if you want to ignore the story and text, nothing wrong with that, but these get translated expressly for them to be read and get context. Telling people to ignore the context and the fetishes presented therein is just dismissive. The entire point of dialogue or story at all is for an emotional response. Is not about separating fact from fiction, its about liking or disliking the plot.
